coding.template: You are a coding expert. Write a {language} function that {task}.
coding.example: Write a Python function that finds the factorial of a number.

blog.template: Write a {tone} blog post about {topic}. Include engaging headings and examples.
blog.example: Write a friendly blog post about learning data science from scratch.

summarize.template: Summarize the following text in {style} style: "{text}"
summarize.example: Summarize the following in bullet points: "Artificial Intelligence is transforming industries..."

email.example: Draft a professional email to HR regarding my internship extension.

creative.template: Write a {genre} story titled '{title}' with a plot involving {element}.
creative.example: Write a sci-fi story titled 'The Last Transmission' involving a time-traveling astronaut.
